summary: Retired rodeo champion Jeff McCloud agrees to mentor novice rodeo contestant Wes Merritt against the wishes of Merritt's wife who fears the dangers of this rough sport.
cast: Susan Hayward|Robert Mitchum|Arthur Kennedy|Arthur Hunnicutt|Frank Faylen|Walter Coy|Carol Nugent|Maria Hart|Lorna Thayer|Burt Mustin|Karen Randle|Jimmie Dodd|Eleanor Todd|Emile Avery|Barbara Blaine|Hazel Boyne|Robert Bray|Ralph Bucko|Roy Bucko|Bob Burrows|Mary Jane Carey|Lane Chandler|Sam Flint|Bob Folkerson|Clem Fuller|Slim Gaut|Roy Glenn|James Gonzalez|Chick Hannan|Don Happy|Riley Hill|Alice Kirby|Mike Lally|Frank Matts|Billy McCoy|John Mitchum|Dennis Moore|Nancy Moore|Fox O'Callahan|Joe Phillips|Marshall Reed|Bob Reeves|Chuck Roberson|Louise Saraydar|Rocky Shahan|George Sherwood|Bert Spencer|Glenn Strange|Jean Stratton|Jack Tornek|Ralph Volkie|Dan White|Chili Williams|Sheb Wooley|Sally Yarnell
title: Hombres errantes
